hero.title: Find Your Advisors
hero.subtitle: Not every advisor is suited for a startup's needs. We know that, so we help you find the right one. Let us know which advisors you need in the next months and we'll find them.
partners.title: Indicate Your Needs
partners.subtitle: Select the timeframe (in months) when you anticipate needing each type of expert.
partners.items.0.title: Notary
partners.items.1.title: Tax Advisor
partners.items.1.description: For tax declarations, optimization, bookkeeping setup.
partners.items.2.title: Auditor
partners.items.2.description: For financial statement audits, compliance checks.
partners.items.3.title: Legal Advisor
partners.items.3.description: For contracts, investment rounds, legal disputes.
partners.items.4.title: Funding Consultant
partners.items.5.title: Data Protection Officer
partners.items.5.description: For GDPR compliance, data privacy policies.
partners.demandInfo.title: Demand-Driven Network
partners.demandInfo.subtitle: We connect with experts once sufficient demand is identified. Your input shapes our partner network!
form.title: Submit Your Interest
form.consent.checkbox: I agree to be contacted regarding potential partner matches
form.consent.subtitle: We respect your privacy and will only share relevant opportunities.
form.success.title: Thank You!
form.success.message: Your interest has been recorded. We'll reach out when we have relevant partner matches based on collective demand.
errorPrompt.noSelection: Please indicate when you might need at least one partner.
errorPrompt.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
errorPrompt.submitFailed: Failed to submit your interest. Please try again.
selectionPrompt.title: Indicate Needs First
selectionPrompt.message: Please select a timeframe for at least one partner from the left panel.
